title: Regarding college transcripts
content:
I'm a second sem student applying for a scholarship that needs me to submit a college transcript. Could anyone please let me know where I need to enquire about this and how long the process will take?

PS: I need the transcripts before the 15th of May, 2023

comments.body: Go ask the accounts department in mrd, they handle all the scholarships iirc.

COE office, basement of B block. You’ll have to fill out a form and make a payment depending on how many copies you want.
They’ll take a day to prepare it usually, so you’ll have to collect it on the next day.
